about_the_game:
This original soundtrack includes all tracks from the game Negligee: Love Storie, as well as the fully voiced song Blind Love from our past promotion.
  • 1. Blooming Girls (Main Theme)
  • 2. Sensual 1
  • 3. Don't Peek
  • 4. Bright Outing
  • 5. Deep Connection
  • 6. Girl's Day
  • 7. Kiss
  • 8. Sad Song
  • 9. Vibrations
  • 10. Get Down
  • 11. Youthful
  • 12. Ambitious
  • 13. Cute Girl
  • 14. Brightness
  • 15. A Little Comedic
  • 16. Daydreamer
  • 17. Erotic Night
  • 18. Flowering Girl
  • 19. One More Touch
  • 20. Closer
  • 21. Last Touch
  • 22. Happy Shiny
  • 23. Blind Love

The original soundtrack from the game was created by Sam L Jones.
The song Blind Love was Produced by E.J.Tilley and sung by Michelle Williams.

Once the DLC has been installed a folder will appear in the games directory with the soundtrack, it should also be available via Steamplayer.

name: Negligee: Love Stories - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: The complete original soundtrack of 23 songs from the game Love Stories, including the 22 game tracks and the fully voiced song 'Blind Love'.
